SEARCH
Package project332

Class PhysicalBorrowableBook

java.lang.Object
project332.Book
project332.PhysicalBorrowableBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Borrowable, Reservable
public class PhysicalBorrowableBook extends Book implements Borrowable, Reservable
The PhysicalBorrowableBook class represents a physical book in the library system that can be borrowed and reserved by users. It inherits from the abstract Book class, which provides shared attributes like title, author, ISBN, genre, and description. This class also implements the Borrowable and Reservable interfaces, enabling borrowing-related behavior and reservation management.

      public void returnResource()
      Marks the book as returned. If there are users in the waiting list, assigns the book to the next user.
      Specified by:

    • reserve

      Reserves the book for the specified user by adding them to the waiting list.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
